participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Shy but creative, Emily often finds herself lost in her thoughts, dreaming of expressing herself through art and fashion.
participant_1.background: I fear losing my dog. I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue. My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school. I'm curious about how to overcome my shyness. I love to play softball.

participant_2.name: Avery
participant_2.personality: Confident and artistic, Avery has a passion for sketching and a keen eye for detail, balancing her studies with her creative endeavors.
participant_2.background: I cherish my sketch book more than anything. I am also a full-time student studying radiology at the local college. I work in commercials. Cher from Clueless is my idea of perfection. I am of average weight.

content.text: Hey there! It's nice to meet you. My name is Cher!
I love your name! It's so unique. Are you a fan of the movie Clueless?
I love that movie! It's one of my favorites! I'm actually really inspired by Cher's character in the movie.
Me too! I love how she's so confident and always knows what she wants. I wish I could be more like her.
You totally could! Just be yourself and don't be afraid to go after what you want.
Thanks for the advice! I'll try my best.
Good luck! I know you can do it!
So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to sketch and paint. I also work in commercials and I'm a full-time student studying radiology at the local college.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be able to draw and paint.
It's never too late to learn! You should give it a try!
Good! I'm sure you'll be great at it!
